DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate correlation invasively measure parameter ( work breathing/power breathing , resistance elastance ) , derive use esophageal pressure measurement , correspond non-invasive estimate value ( noninvasive work breathing/power breathing , resistance elastance ) , compute use airway pressure flow measurement .
